name: Sun
inBirthChart: Your core identity, ego, and life purpose. Shows how you shine and express yourself.
retrograde: Rare. Deepens self-reflection, re-evaluation of identity and purpose.

name: Moon
inBirthChart: Your emotional nature, instincts, and subconscious patterns. Shows how you nurture and feel secure.
retrograde: Rare. Emotional processing, healing childhood patterns, reconnecting with inner self.

name: Mercury
inBirthChart: How you think, communicate, and process information. Your learning style and mental approach.
retrograde: 3-4 times/year, 3 weeks. Review, reflection, reconnection. Communication delays, tech issues.

name: Venus
inBirthChart: What you value, how you love, and what brings you pleasure. Your relationship style and aesthetic.
retrograde: Every 18 months, 6 weeks. Re-evaluate relationships, values, spending. Not ideal for new commitments.

name: Mars
inBirthChart: How you take action, assert yourself, and pursue desires. Your energy, drive, and passion.
retrograde: Every 2 years, 2-3 months. Internal work, suppressed anger, re-evaluating goals. Avoid starting new projects.

name: Jupiter
inBirthChart: Where you expand, find luck, and seek meaning. Your philosophy, beliefs, and areas of abundance.
retrograde: Once/year, 4 months. Inner growth, spiritual development, re-evaluating beliefs and expansion.

name: Saturn
inBirthChart: Where you face challenges, build discipline, and learn life lessons. Your responsibilities and boundaries.
retrograde: Once/year, 4.5 months. Inner discipline, reassessing responsibilities, facing fears and limitations.

name: Uranus
inBirthChart: Where you seek freedom, innovation, and break from tradition. Your uniqueness and rebellious streak.
retrograde: Once/year, 5 months. Internal revolution, breaking free from constraints, authentic self-expression.

name: Neptune
inBirthChart: Where you connect with spirituality, dreams, and the collective unconscious. Your intuition and idealism.
retrograde: Once/year, 5 months. Deep spiritual work, artistic inspiration, confronting illusions and delusions.

name: Pluto
inBirthChart: Where you experience deep transformation, power dynamics, and rebirth. Your shadow and regeneration.
inTransits: Deep change, endings, rebirth, power struggles, transformation
retrograde: 5 months/year. Inner transformation, releasing control, healing deep wounds, personal power.
